name: Circle It Up
overview:
Circle It Up is the smarter way to get paid: it’s low-cost, convenient and secure mobile POS system.

Circle It Up gives Small and Medium Businesses the freedom to process card payments anywhere and anytime using a smartphone or tablet. No matter where they are – on the go, in there shop, at a customer’s – with our technology, now everyone can accept cards.

Low-cost

Circle It Up is tailored to the needs of small businesses, with flexible pricing such as pay as you go options and without long-term financial commitments or high fixed fees. So unlike traditional card payment solutions which are expensive and designed for large corporations, we give you a package which meets your usage.

Convenient

Card transactions are approved immediately and then payment is guaranteed, unlike cheques or invoices which can bounce or go unpaid. Once the transaction is complete, the amount gets deposited straight into the bank account – much quicker and easier than cheques, invoices or even cash. Since Circle It Up works with your smartphone or tablet, you can accept payments anywhere you can get phone reception or wifi internet.

Secure

We are obsessed with keeping you and your customers safe. We use cutting-edge secure encryption technology that adheres strictly to industry standards. And, because it’s cards, you get far more peace of mind than with cash, cheques or other methods which are more susceptible to theft or fraud.

Based in Gurgaon and Haryana, Circle It Up is a strategic brand of Brainy Lions Online Services (P) Ltd. and is driven by Founder and CEO Tanuj Sethi - An entrepreneur who want to do things differently from the way big businesses operate.

Card and mobile payments have never been so affordable or convenient.

Circle It Up – the smarter way to get paid - Swipe it, Sign It, Sell it.
